gov.usgs.alarm

Class EdgemomConfigInstanceThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • gov.usgs.anss.edgethread.EdgeThread
        • gov.usgs.alarm.EdgemomConfigInstanceThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class EdgemomConfigInstanceThread
extends EdgeThread
    This is a 24/7 thread which monitors changes in the edge database for changes that require reconfiguration of an edge/cwb node. It is run as part of Alarm process on nodes that need auto-configuration based on the instance database. It insures the the 1) crontab for each active account is correct, 2) builds EDGEMOM/* files, 3) Moves all role_* groups_* files to the right cpuAccounts, 4) Moves edge.prop files to all active cpuAccounts (ones with non-zero crontabs), 5) insures the IPs associated with the assigned cpuRoles are up and operating on this node and that any cpuRoles not assigned to this node are not being offered.

    The crontab logic was expanded to allow tags in the crontab to control the jobs that must be run as vdl, should only be run if the crontab is assigned to the vdl account, or which should be run in the assigned account. 

     switch   values    Description
 -db     DBURL     Override the DBServer property name with this URL

      • makeAllFiles

        public void makeAllFiles(java.lang.String configDir,
                         java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,Cpu> cpus,
                         java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,RoleInstance> roleMap,
                         java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,EdgeMomInstance> instances,
                         java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,EdgemomInstanceSetup>> threads,
                         java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
        This method creates all group_NODE, roles_NODE and edgemom.setup files from the database for all cpuRoles and for the current cpuRoles-to-cpu mappings and puts them in the EDGEMOM directory. It also writes all edgefile side files into the EDGEMOM directory. This is called by the EdgemomConfigThread.run() to create all the files when a reconfiguration event is detected.
        Parameters:
        configDir - Path to the configuration directory
        cpus - A treemap of the CPUs defined on the system
        roleMap -
        instances -
        threads -
        sb -

      • getEdgeMomSetupSB

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getEdgeMomSetupSB(java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.String,EdgemomInstanceSetup> threads,
                                                 EdgeMomInstance instance,
                                                 java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
        this will add the threads for the given roll and account and return an StringBuilder with the results. Duplicates tags and only threads will have been eliminated if there are any in the given threads plus the added threads from roll and account.
        Parameters:
        threads - List of threads, if not empty the roll/account will be added to this list
        instance - the instance we are making and edgemom.setup for
        sb - The user String builder to use making this edgemom.setup
        Returns:
        The string builder with the edgemom.setup file, and the amended set of threads

        Parameters:
